name: TKSmartCardSlot
desc: A single smart card reader slot in the system.

items.name: func makeSmartCard() -> TKSmartCard?
items.desc: Creates a new TKSmartCard object representing the currently inserted Smart Card.

items.name: var state: TKSmartCardSlot.State
items.desc: The current state of the Smart Card reader slot.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the Smart Card reader slot.

items.name: var maxInputLength: Int
items.desc: The maximum length of input APDU (Application Protocol Data Unit) that the Smart Card reader slot is able to transfer to the Smart Card.

items.name: var maxOutputLength: Int
items.desc: The maximum length of output APDU (Application Protocol Data Unit) that the Smart Card reader slot is able to transfer from the Smart Card.

items.name: var atr: TKSmartCardATR?
items.desc: The ATR (Answer to Reset) of the inserted Smart Card, or nil if no Smart Card is inserted or the inserted Smart Card is mute.

items.name: class TKSmartCardATR
items.desc: A parsed ATR (Answer To Reset) message from a Smart Card.
